Text.Language: Niourwou t/rou n~te p~kahi: cemosi qen peouwini: ouoh nieynoc qen peviri: w~ Maria y~mau m~V].
All the kings of the earth / walk in your light / and all nations in your illumination / O Mary, Mother of God.
